name: Poppable
author: Engramium

sections.description: If you are looking for an efficient conversion tool, this one could surely help. More importantly, it is particularly easy to work with this plugin. Poppable Exit Popup automatically detects the mouse behaviors on desktop and scroll behaviour on mobile to show a pop up window which indicates your visitors are about to leave your site.
sections.installation:
Poppable has been developed to be really simple to use and requires little configuration and setting changes to start creating & managing PopUp.

Either download the plugin directly from your WordPress admin or upload the .zip file.
Click install, once installed, activate and you’re done!
Once installed and activated you’ll find a new “Poppable” menu in your admin menu.
sections.faq:
What are the requirements to use Poppable?

You only need to have at least 4.4 or higher version of WordPress on your website.
